title: ActiBud
description: Android app enabling efficient monitoring and management of students' activity points as per AICTE and other proctor tasks.

title: HelpingHands
description: A Real-time sign language detection website using Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN) to accurately recognise sign language gestures.

title: Automated Dysgraphia Detection (in progress)
description: Capstone project, focusing on early detection of dysgraphia in primary and middle school students.
